General.Name: Streamplay Studio Ltd.
General.Description: StreamPlay Studio Limited, a service and platform provider, specializes in the mobile game streaming, and music and video content across multiple regions worldwide. It owns and operates ArcadeX, a gaming and esports platform, where subscribers compete in sponsored tournaments to establish rankings, win prizes, and earn participation rewards. The company was formerly known as Emerge Gaming Limited and changed its name to StreamPlay Studio Limited in December 2022. The company is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.
